Package cea.util.monitoring

Class CuSumDetector

java.lang.Object
cea.util.monitoring.MonitoringDetector
cea.util.monitoring.CuSumDetector
Direct Known Subclasses:
CuSumDetectorOnLine
public class CuSumDetector
extends MonitoringDetector
Detector based in Cumulative Sum (cusum) algorithm Detection based on the whole accumulated data https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CUSUM We only consider metrics with one evaluation output (no multi-output evaluation metrics allowed)
Author:
sg244422

    • factor

      private int factor
      Factor to compute the cusum threshold Usually 4 or 5 Default: 5

    • drift

      private double drift
      Drift: Likelihood function, but this is common usage. CUSUM_(i+1) = max(0, CUSUM_i+value+ drift)) Default: 0
